mapper.insert: insert into t_collections(id, project_id, ticket_code, source_of, payment_type, amount, bank_account, bank_name, trice, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, description, status) values ( #{id}, #{projectId}, #{ticketCode}, #{sourceOf}, #{paymentType}, #{amount}, #{bankAccount}, #{bankName}, #{trice}, now(), #{createUser}, now(), #{createUser}, #{description}, #{status} )
